title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Move fast & don't break things: Maintaining software excellence as you adopt AI
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 快速行动且不破坏现状：在采用AI时保持软件卓越性
abstract: As engineering teams lean on AI assistants to write more code and automate more of the SDLC, new risks arise. Vulnerabilities, secret leaks, and quality regressions can creep in faster than humans can catch them. This talk explores how to prepare your organization for AI adoption by strengthening the engineering excellence foundations that matter in an AI-first world, like software ownership, testing, service catalogs, and vulnerability management. With the right culture and controls, teams can capture the speed of AI while preserving the security, reliability, and quality customers expect. This presentation is brought to you by Cortex, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 随着工程团队越来越依赖AI助手来编写更多代码和自动化更多软件开发生命周期流程,新的风险也随之出现。漏洞、密钥泄露和质量退化可能会以超过人类捕获速度的方式悄然出现。本次演讲探讨如何通过加强在AI优先世界中至关重要的工程卓越基础来为组织的AI采用做好准备,例如软件所有权、测试、服务目录和漏洞管理。通过正确的文化和控制措施,团队可以在保持客户期望的安全性、可靠性和质量的同时,获得AI带来的速度优势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cortex为您呈现。
